reviews.sentence: Friendly staff and comfortable stay. Good location in the heart of Kiev with an easy access to major sightseeing and also in a quiet diplomatic area. The check in process was fast and staff was very friendly. Room was clean and spacious with comfortable bed coffee machine and all you need bathroom amenities. Worth to visit hotel restaurant Mile Miglia amazing food and great chef.

Business trip to Kiev. I spent 3 nights at the hotel. It was a recent business trip and I am writing the review based on very fresh experience. Overall the hotel was very nice the staff was friendly the breakfast was very good they had some wonderful croissants and nice cold beverage cranberry mors. The location is good the hotel is really close to the main street Kreshatik. I would recommend the hotel for business trips only it is definitely not a good option for romantic or family stay boring and a bit overpriced to be the honest.

Central location and good service. Hotel is located in a centre and the staff is kind and helpful. The street is busy during the day with some restaurants and cafes but more quiet during the evenings. Few minutes walk from historical part and also from public transport amenities.

Okay hotel. Was an okay hotel good location for exploring Kiev on foot but in my opinion too expensive compared to other similar located hotels friendly and service minded staff though. Hot breakfast meals made to your desire.
Excellent. Good food very nice staff. A little over priced.

Very good Hotel. Radison Blu Hotel Kyiv is very good hotel and located in very good place. Rooms are very nice and breakfast is great. we stayed 2 nights and enjoyed the hotel location and staff. We recommend this hotel.

Great hotel. Great hotel close to everything walking distance from metro golden gate. Staff is friendly and service was pretty good. Free wifi and wonderful buffet breakfast. Bar is pretty pricey so if you are looking for good cheap beer walk 5 minutes down the street to golden gate pub.

Kiev Radison Stay. A remarkable option for the business tripin Kiev. Breakfast is fine SPA could be better. There was no minibar in may room and heating could be better. Thanks to staff and management for their kind approach.

really nice stay. the hotel was located in the old part of of town which was great walkable distance to eateries and places. the bed was great it was clean and it was quiet. I was there on work so did not have a chance to experience the various facilities. the breakfast had variety and the staff are very friendly and helpful. the internet speed was good and airport transfers went without a glitch. missed having milk in the room for tea. but that is a minor thing. highly recommended.
Great business Hotel in the Heart of Kiew. Centrally located business hotel with great breakfast in the heart of Kiew close to The Golden Gate friendly staff and quiet area.

Very expensive for the service and room we got. And no compensation at all. Yes we can not working. Air condition and central AC was somehow out of function. Staff did not fix this or do anything with price. AC was broken and it was extermely hot in room. July warm season.

Did not feel welcome. Location room room service. Staff is the lobby bar was very unprofessional and slow. We ordered coffee to go and it took them 10 minutes to print an invoice. We had to pay taxi extra for waiting. Prices for coffee water etc are 10. times higher then in nearest supermarket. I understand that drinks and food in mini bar are always expensive but such price difference of water no welcome free water on arrival BTW is ridiculous. It is Kyiv not Dubai. Staff in general very unwelcoming no smiles generic approach to guests. Plus I am originally from Ukraine and was very upset that nobody spoke Ukrainian only Russian with me. First time it happened to me. I felt like I am in Moscow not Kyiv.

Beautiful NONSMOKING fresh clean air and property. We traveled with a 5months old baby and were assisted very well. Got the chin. Morning coffee in the lobby with fruit and snacks is a nice touch. There was an event at the hotels but it did n’t disturb the service at all.
Hotel is average. Not worth the money. personal at the reception is not very friendly. location is the only good thing.
It is ok. I had stay again if they accommodate better beds. Good and food service was very godThe beds were horrible. Hard and small. Got a neck problem from the poor pillows.

Average at best sadly. Poor for a hotel of this group. The shower did not work on assuming occupation of the room and was visibly not working. I had to ask for it to be repaired. Second morning no milk to make tea in the room so I went to the bar and said no milk in the tray to make tea and was charge 5 euros for a tiny drop of milk. Had breakfast once and it was dire absolutely dreadful and the charge was 20 euros each. Got back at 80 pm on Saturday night with an urgent need of a beer and the bar was unmanned. Got to room and no bathtowels. I got ripped off twice in my view and the amount I paid for the room does not justify this level of service.

Solid hotel but for unexpected construction. The Radison Blu sounded promising a four star hotel at little more than half the price of the nearby five star hotels with a location that was almost as convenient to sights and the metro. Our room was modern immaculate and in excellent repair with a comfortable king size bed abundant closet space and an in room safe. The bathroom was well equipped with ample vanity space. Our sixth floor room was quiet with minimal traffic noise despite bring on the street side. The WiFi was fast and easy to use. Our rate included the breakfast buffet which was comprehensive and well staffed although some of the staff seemed inexperienced eg clearing plates prematurely. We were delighted that our room was available despite our arrival at 930 AM. Other guests might not be so fortunate but this was a huge plus for us. All of this would lead me to give the Radison an “ excellent ” rating but there were annoyances. A small one. unlike most competing hotels in Kyiv the Radison quotes rates without taxes which are only added in at checkout resulting in misleading comparison shopping. But the much more significant problem is that the lobby of the hotel is undergoing major renovation. The absence of a lobby was not the problem what seemed to be the breakfast area was pressed into service as a small reception space with boxes of supplies on the floor breakfast was instead served in the restaurant space. The issue was construction noise which started at 9 AM and was continuing when we returned from dinner at 830 PM on a Sunday. In addition a circuitous path through the construction zone was required to access the elevator see photos with two of three being inaccessible to guests. That the hotel was being renovated with construction extending into the evening hours clearly should have been disclosed on the hotel website. If you stay here while construction is continuing a room on a high floor would clearly be recommended.

Lovely hotel and lovely staff. Well it is said that a first impression is everything and this hotel does not disappoint. A sleek and smart reception lobby and very friendly and helpful reception staff. Check in and first impressions really gave a vote of confidence in what to expect in this hotel. Was given a room on a higher floor and again really smart. Classy decoration design spotlessly clean and well stocked. The room had an iron ironing board safe stocked minibar shoe cleaning accessories slippers complimentary water and all the usual bathroom necessities. The room service menu is different to that in the main restaurant which is exclusively Italian. Restaurant service was quick and efficient and friendly. Food was really nice and complimented by bread and olives. The food was nicer than what I ’ve had in ItalyBreakfast has pretty much everything you ’d want with the exception of more basic cereals and a decent toaster. But this is nitpicking as the breakfast buffet is extensive and from what I had really nice. Staff were again full of smiles and very friendly and willing to help. The lady on the front desk who takes your room number is just full of cheer. A great way to start the day. The gym and spa area is nice. Gym well equipped for a hotel with separate male and female changing rooms with showers. The sauna and steam room is mixed sex. Both the sauna and steam room are large and outside are loungers and showers. Towels are provided. The gym spa is unmanned so you just help yourself to towels robes and slippers. Ca n’t really fault this hotel everything I ’ve experienced is great. I would n’t hesitate to recommend this hotel and were I to return to Kyiv this hotel is my first and only choice.

Lovely staff and breakfast but could do better in other areas. Very pleasant and helpful staff. Excellent breakfast. Poor room service. Bath towels the size of hand towels. Rip off prices for mini bar items.

Not on the level of Radison BLU. Hotel is average has a good location decent rooms small bar crowded breakfast etc. But what really was bad was people not paying attention and even lying to you directly about events in a hotel. They have a very noisy procedure of garbage collection or whatever right in the middle of courtyard of the hotel around midnight and for 30 mins if feels like someone is bombarding the hotel. Number of people went to the reception to complain but the answer was we do not know what is happening. even if they were clearly responsible for the noise. Smiling and lying. Unbelievable. My last visit here for sure. Air condition was not working properly could not shut down the heating at all so needed to sleep with the open window in December. Stuff like that. I am frequent traveler one of the worst price experience ratios so far.
